title: "Fujifilm integrates AI software to help identify bone trauma at POC (Point-of-Care)"
excerpt: "BoneView® is a revolutionary AI software designed to assist radiologists and emergency clinicians in the diagnosis of skeletal fractures. It uses advanced algorithms to detect and localise lesions on X-rays – graphically highlighting areas of interest – before submitting the images to radiologists for validation."
